snippet: The “very preliminary” cause of death was announced Tuesday, and a second Virginia Tech student charged in the girl’s death now faces charges of helping commit the murder.
abstract: Blacksburg, Va, authorities say teenager Nicole Madison Lovell was probably stabbed to death by Virginia Tech student David Eisenhauer on day she vanished, and not days later as originally believed; Natalie Marie Keepers, also a student at Virginia Tech, faces charges that include accessory to fact before first-degree murder, which carries sentence of 20 years to life.
lead_paragraph: The “very preliminary” cause of death was announced Tuesday, and a second Virginia Tech student charged in the girl’s death now faces charges of helping commit the murder.

headline.main: Virginia Girl Probably Died the Day She Vanished, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Girl Probably Died the Day She Vanished, Officials Say

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
